title: S&P's Glickman on Oil Supply, Sees Crude Dipping to $39 (Audio)
itunes:title: S&P's Glickman on Oil Supply, Sees Crude Dipping to $39 (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. GUEST: Stewart Glickman, Equity Analyst and Group Head of Energy and Materials from S&P Capital, on oil hitting above $50 for the first time in six months, and outlook for energy stocks.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
